title: Angelus
text:
℣. The Angel of the Lord declared unto Mary.
℟. And she conceived of the Holy Ghost
Hail Mary...

℣. Behold the handmaid of the Lord.
℟. Be it done unto me according to Thy word.
Hail Mary...

℣. And the Word was made flesh.
℟. And dwelt among us.
Hail Mary...

℣. Pray for us O Holy Mother of God.
℟. That we may be made worthy of the promises of Christ

Let us pray.
Pour fourth, we beseech Three, O Lord, Thy grace into our hearts, that we, to whom the Incarnation of Christ Thy Son was made known by the message of an Angel, may be brought, by His Passion and cross, to the glory of His resurrection.
Through the same Christ our Lord.
℟. Amen.
